Class com.polk.appointment.Time_Slot 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.util.Date
           |
           +----com.polk.appointment.Time_Slot
class Time_Slot
extends Date
implements Serializable, Identifiable, Component_Interface
A Time Slot is a piece of a schedule. Since it extends date, it can be compared like one. It also has a duration, in minutes, and two time slots can be checked to see if they overlap.

This class is not public and therefore cannot be used outside this package.
